actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution to establish "National Volunteer Firefighters' Day" on the second Saturday of August of each year.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the second Saturday of August of each year as "National Volunteer Firefighters' Day."

titles.title: A resolution to establish "National Volunteer Firefighters' Day" on the second Saturday of August of each year.
